metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0081 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in actionview/lib/action_view/helpers/number_helper.rb in Ruby on Rails before 3.2.17, 4.0.x before 4.0.3, and 4.1.x before 4.1.0.beta2 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) format, (2) negative_format, or (3) units parameter to the (a) number_to_currency, (b) number_to_percentage, or (c) number_to_human helper.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> in Oneiric+, rails package is just for transition

criterions.comment: rails-4.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ruby-actionpack-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
